kDesc

This great value for money bundle comes complete with four amazing T-1000 full body outfits. This bundle includes: 


* T2: Judgment Day - T-1000 with Pointed Hands (Male) 
 * T2: Judgment Day - T-1000 with Pointed Hands and Damage (Male) 
 * T2 - Judgment Day - Metal T-1000 (Male) 
 * T2 - Judgment Day - Metal T-1000 with Pointed Hands (Male) 


※Upon purchase, all items will be added to their corresponding categories. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved.[#Legal]

Ce lot économique comporte quatre formidables costumes intégraux du T-1000. Ce lot comprend : 

 * T2 : Le Jugement Dernier – T-1000 aux mains pointues (Homme) 
 * T2 : Le Jugement Dernier – T-1000 aux mains pointues et dégâts (Homme) 
 * T2 : Le Jugement Dernier – T-1000 de métal (Homme) 
 * T2 : Le Jugement Dernier – T-1000 de métal aux mains pointues (Homme) 


※À l’achat, tous les objets seront ajoutés à leurs catégories respectives. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved.[#Legal]

Dieses Bundle mit fantastischem Preis/Leistungsverhältnis umfasst vier geniale T-1000-Ganzkörperoutfits. Dieses Bundle umfasst: 


* T2: Tag der Abrechnung - T-1000 mit spitzen Händen (männlich) 
 * T2: Tag der Abrechnung - T-1000 mit spitzen Händen und Schäden (männlich) 
 * T2 - Tag der Abrechnung - Metallener T-1000 (männlich) 
 * T2 - Tag der Abrechnung - Metallener T-1000 mit spitzen Händen (männlich) 


※Nach dem Kauf werden alle Gegenstände zur entsprechenden Kategorie hinzugefügt. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved.[#Legal]

Questo pacchetto vale tutti i soldi che costa e contiene quattro fantastici completi T-1000. Questo pacchetto include: 


* T2: Il giorno del giudizio - T-1000 con mani appuntite (uomo) 
 * T2: Il giorno del giudizio - T-1000 con mani appuntite e danno (uomo) 
 * T2 - Il giorno del giudizio - T-1000 di metallo (uomo) 
 *T2 - Il giorno del giudizio - T-1000 di metallo con mani appuntite (uomo) 


※Dopo l'acquisto, gli articoli verranno aggiunti alle categorie corrispondenti. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved.[#Legal]

Este paquete genial y de gran valor viene con cuatro atuendos de cuerpo completo del T-1000. El paquete incluye: 


* T2: el juicio final. T-1000 con manos puntiagudas (hombre) 
 * T2: el juicio final. T-1000 con daño y manos puntiagudas (hombre) 
 * T2: el juicio final. T-1000 metal (hombre) 
 * T2: el juicio final. T-1000 metal con manos puntiagudas (hombre) 


※Tras la compra, los objetos se añadirán a su categoría correspondiente. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved.[#Legal]

このお値打ちのセット商品には、なんとT-1000の全身コスチュームが4点も付いてきます。

本セットには、下記アイテムが含まれています。
 * T2 -T-1000 鋭利なハンド付き（男性用）/組み合わせ
 * T2 - T-1000 鋭利なハンドとダメージ付き（男性用）/組み合わせ
 * T2 - 液体金属T-1000（男性用）/組み合わせ
 * T2 – 液体金属T-1000 鋭利なハンド付き（男性用）/組み合わせ 
 ※購入すると、該当カテゴリに各アイテムが追加されます。

Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved.[#Legal]

이 저렴한 가격의 번들은 T-1000의 4가지 환상적인 전신 복장을 제공합니다. 이 번들은 다음 아이템을 포함합니다: 


●터미네이터 2: 심판의 날 - 뾰족한 손을 가진 T-1000 (남성)
 ●터미네이터 2: 심판의 날 - 뾰족한 손을 가지고 손상을 입은 T-1000 (남성)
 ●터미네이터 2: 심판의 날 - 메탈 T-1000 (남성)
 ●터미네이터 2: 심판의 날 - 뾰족한 손을 가진 메탈 T-1000 (남성)


※모든 아이템은 구입과 동시에 해당 카테고리에 추가됩니다. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved.[#Legal]
